response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and dedication. Given its unique features and the unparalleled quality, we believe its value extends far beyond its tangible aspects. We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive opportunity is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for premium offerings. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this masterpiece into your possession and enhancing your experience with its unmatched capabilities.", "product_price": 950000}
